    • Method Detail

      • sleep

      • tmp

        public static final Path tmp()
        Returns a path for hosting temporarily files and directories. It will be deleted this thread has been terminated. If the invoking thread is not an instance of MasterThread null is returned.
        Returns:
        a path located in (one of the) system's temporarily directory or null if the invoking thread is no instance of MasterThread.
